TailPySCSS v0.5.1 includes a comprehensive suite of 30+ components. Below are live visual previews using the actual framework logic.

Dogfooding Note: The previews below use the exact same HTML attributes (ui="...") that the Python engine generates.

Base & Layout

Card

A flexible container with shadow, padding, and rounded corners.

Card Title

This is a card. It uses ui="card".

Card(
    children=[
        "This is a card...",
        Button("Action")
    ]
)

Button

Standard interactive button.

Button("Primary", class_="tp-btn-primary")

Badge

Small status indicator.

New Default Success 
Badge("New")

Alert

Contextual feedback message.

Payment Successful! Your order has been processed.

Alert("Payment Successful!")

Navbar

Top navigation header.

Brand
Home About 
Navbar(
   Link("Home"), Link("About")
)

Forms

Input data with style. Vibe-aware borders and focus states.

Input

Input(placeholder="email@example.com")

Switch

Toggle switch (prettier checkbox).

Switch(label="Enable Dark Mode")

Navigation

Tabs

Tabs("Profile", "Settings", "Billing")

Spinner()
